import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { getAll } from '../BooksAPI'; function Shelf() { const [books, setBooks] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { getAll().then((data) => { setBooks(data); console.log(books); }).catch((error) => { console.log(error); // Xử lý lỗi khi fetch gặp vấn đề }); }, []); return (
